docs.snippet: Although the neutral delegates to the Chaco peace conference are still optimistic over the prospects for an early peace between Bolivia and Paraguay, difficulties have arisen in Paraguay that may delay peace, even if they do not prevent it...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although the neutral delegates to the Chaco peace conference are still optimistic over the prospects for an early peace between Bolivia and Paraguay, difficulties have arisen in Paraguay that may delay peace, even if they do not prevent it altogether.
docs.abstract: urges Govt to approve Chaco peace treaty; mentioned as possible Pres candidate

docs.snippet: With interest again centered in the railroad issues and the local traction bonds, the bond market continued to move into new high territory yesterday as the volume increased on the New York Stock Exchange. Total sales reached $8,727,900 compared with...
docs.lead_paragraph: With interest again centered in the railroad issues and the local traction bonds, the bond market continued to move into new high territory yesterday as the volume increased on the New York Stock Exchange. Total sales reached $8,727,900 compared with $8,345,500 on Tuesday.

headline.main: BONDS AGAIN RISE IN ACTIVE TRADING; Rails and Local Tractions Lead Upswing--Federal Issues Decline TURNOVER IS $8,727,900 Several in Industrial List Reach High Marks for YearIndex Gains 0.06 Point

docs.snippet: Admiral Emory S. Land, chairman of the United States Maritime Commission, announced today the commission had awarded to Arthur Kudner, Inc., of New York City, a contract to handle the preliminary advertising program of the American Republics Line,...
docs.lead_paragraph: Admiral Emory S. Land, chairman of the United States Maritime Commission, announced today the commission had awarded to Arthur Kudner, Inc., of New York City, a contract to handle the preliminary advertising program of the American Republics Line, which will operate the new express and steamship service between New York and Brazil, Uruguay and Argentina.
docs.abstract: awards A Kudner Inc ad program contract

docs.snippet: Both Bolivia and Paraguay officially notified the Argentine Government today of their formal acceptance without reservations of the Chaco peace terms initialed here on July 9. Preparations were being made hurriedly tonight for signing the peace...
docs.lead_paragraph: Both Bolivia and Paraguay officially notified the Argentine Government today of their formal acceptance without reservations of the Chaco peace terms initialed here on July 9. Preparations were being made hurriedly tonight for signing the peace treaty at a solemn ceremony either tomorrow or Tuesday.

headline.main: TWO CHACO POWERS TO SIGN PEACE PACT; Bolivia and Paraguay Notify Argentina of Acceptance Without Reservations BORDER TO BE ARBITRATED Ceremony Marking Accord to Be Held Today or Tomorrow--Long Dispute Is Ended Ends Week of Uncertainty Saved Peace Conference Peace Treaty is Brief Free Transit Assured Paraguay Retains Vast Area
